FuncDef:
The diameter gx event-trigger version command changes the Usage_Report value of Event-Trigger.
The undo diameter gx event-trigger version command restores the default Usage_Report value of Event-Trigger.
The default Usage_Report value of Event-Trigger is 26. That is, the default version is v9.4.0.
The default Usage_Report value of Event-Trigger is 26. That is, the default version is v9.4.0.
CLIs: diameter gx event-trigger version { r940 | r970 }
undo diameter gx event-trigger version [ r940 | r970 ]

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates v9.4.0. That is, the Usage_Report value is 26.
-

Indicates v9.7.0. That is, the Usage_Report value is 33.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable Diameter to interwork with a device on the live network, run the diameter gx event-trigger version command to change the Usage_Report value of Event-Trigger to 26 or 33 to adapt to v9.4.0 or v9.7.0.
Precautions
If the Usage_Report value of Event-Trigger is set to 26 on a device but is 33 on a server, service quotas fail to be delivered.If the Usage_Report value of Event-Trigger is set to 33 on a device but is 26 on a server, service quotas are successfully delivered. However, quota exhaustion information fails to be reported to the server.Service quotas are successfully delivered and quota exhaustion information are successfully reported to the server only when the Usage_Report value of Event-Trigger is the same on a device and server.
